revision.text:
[[Image:Okres lucenec.png|thumb|right|300px|Location of Lučenec District in the [[Banská Bystrica Region]]]] '''Píla''' is a [[village]] and [[municipality]] in the [[Lučenec District]] in the [[Banská Bystrica Region]] of [[Slovakia]]. [[Image:Slovakiakrajenumbers.png|left|thumb|300px|6: Banská Bystrica Region in Slovakia]]









==External links== *http://www.statistics.sk/mosmis/eng/run.html {{Lucenec District}} {{coord|48|29|00|N|19|30|26|E|source:huwiki_region:SK_type:city|display=title}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Pila, Lucenec District}} [[Category:Villages and municipalities in Lučenec District]] {{BanskáBystrica-geo-stub}}
